name: Train of Thought pvt limited
overview:
We are Pakistan’s only mobile ad network. Not only that we have developed an algorithm which can increase ad relevance significantly and is self learning. Also Pakistan is one of the most neglected markets which is ready to explode given the rapid smartphone growth. With over 100 million cellular users and 20 million smartphone users it is ready for a company that can provide localized content and a monetization mechanism. We have started off by making a few mobile apps which are gaining popularity. Our user base is increasing and as soon as we hit 1000000 users (expected by Dec 2013) we will start pushing ads both in app and out of app (with customized audio alerts as well). I cannot sum up everything in a paragraph but in case someone wants to have a chat i am always available at +92-321-840-4400

Sharjeel Minhas, CFA

CEO Train of Thought
